rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to change the settings.

slide_container_out.description: Slide the container out to fill it.

slide_container_in.description: Slide the container back in after filling it.

slide_lid_open.description: Slide the lid open to fill the container.

slide_lid_close.description: Slide the lid close after filling the container.

clean_coffee_machine.description: Clean the coffee machine body to maintain cleanliness.

wholeset.description: A common process of making coffee, covering sliding container out, opening and closing lid, and rotate knob

clean_all.description: Cleaning all parts of the coffee machine including knob, container, lid and body.
